english_example_sentence: You can try the spectacular colorful Indian spiced curry dish
russian_example_sentence: Вы можете попробовать эту спектакулярную красочную индийскую острую карри
turkish_example_sentence: Siz muhteşem renkli Hint baharatlı curry yemeğini deneyebilirsiniz
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz muhteşem renkli Hint baharatlı curry yemeğini ______
